item.title: 5 new minimal images at the download area
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description: In the download area 5 new minimal images for ioBroker are available from now on.. Raspberry Pi2/3 Tinkerboard Orange Pi plus 2e Rock64 Odroid C2 All these images comprise only the admin and the discovery adapter, so these images are an optimal basis for everyone
item.content:encoded:
In the download area 5 new minimal images for ioBroker are available from now on..

  • Raspberry Pi2/3
  • Tinkerboard
  • Orange Pi plus 2e
  • Rock64
  • Odroid C2

All these images comprise only the admin and the discovery adapter, so these images are an optimal basis for everyone

item.title: [Announcement] Forum Changeover on Feb. 9th 2019 starting at 18:00 CET
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description:
Hello dear forum users, The forum changeover will take place on Saturday the 9th of February starting about 18:00. Your users’ passwords are not inherited. For this reason please use the password forgot function after conversion. Please check before the changeover that…
Read more [Announcement] Forum Changeover on Feb. 9th 2019 starting at 18:00 CET ›
item.content:encoded:
Hello dear forum users,

The forum changeover will take place on Saturday the 9th of February starting about 18:00. Your users’ passwords are not inherited. For this reason please use the password forgot function after conversion.

Please check before the changeover that you have a current e-mail address in your profile! 

For more information, we have summarized at viewtopic.php?t=21406 and will keep this thread up to date. Please use this also with questions.

Your ioBroker team

item.title: [Announcement] Maintenance work Free-Cloud and website on 06.01.2019
item.dc:creator: eric2905
item.description: On 06.01.2019, maintenance work will take place at 9 pm on the Free-Cloud. Duration approx. 1 hour. Further information and discussions in the forum: Link Your ioBroker team
item.content:encoded:
On 06.01.2019, maintenance work will take place at 9 pm on the Free-Cloud. Duration approx. 1 hour.

Further information and discussions in the forum: Link

Your ioBroker team

item.title: * Special Offer at Christmas with ioBroker.iot until 06.01.2019
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description: There is a special offer at Christmas for Smart Assistants (Alexa, IFTTT, Google Home). for further informatins refer to the posts in the german forum: https://forum.iobroker.net/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=19849
item.content:encoded:
There is a special offer at Christmas for Smart Assistants (Alexa, IFTTT, Google Home).

for further informatins refer to the posts in the german forum: https://forum.iobroker.net/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=19849

item.title: * Maintenance of the pro cloud December 22nd 2018 at 10pm
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description:
On Saturday Dec. 22nd maintenance of the pro cloud will be performed. The maintenance will last 1 hour maximum. If all works perfectly the downtime will be shorter. Your systems will reconnect automatically at end of work. All services, incl.…
Read more * Maintenance of the pro cloud December 22nd 2018 at 10pm ›
item.content:encoded:
On Saturday Dec. 22nd maintenance of the pro cloud will be performed.

The maintenance will last 1 hour maximum. If all works perfectly the downtime will be shorter.

Your systems will reconnect automatically at end of work.

All services, incl. Alexa, won’t be accessible ath this time.

We apologize for any inconvenience.

The maintanance will ensure the quality of our services in future.

item.title: Maintenance work iobroker.pro on 08.12.2018
item.dc:creator: eric2905
item.description:
Hello everybody, On 08.12.2018 there will be maintenance work on the Pro-Cloud (iobroker.pro) from 22:00. It can therefore come to failures, etc .. The duration of the maintenance work is not certain yet – as soon as I have more…
Read more Maintenance work iobroker.pro on 08.12.2018 ›
item.content:encoded:
Hello everybody,

On 08.12.2018 there will be maintenance work on the Pro-Cloud (iobroker.pro) from 22:00.
It can therefore come to failures, etc ..

The duration of the maintenance work is not certain yet – as soon as I have more detailed information, I will post it here.

Your ioBroker team

item.title: Maintenance work on ioBroker.pro at 12.01 from 22:00 (10pm)
item.dc:creator: eric2905
item.description: Please note that technical work will be carried out on the ioBroker.pro server on this Friday, 12:01 from 22:00 (10pm) to 08:00 (08:00am) the next day and the page will not be available. This also applies to Alexa, etc.
item.content:encoded:
Please note that technical work will be carried out on the ioBroker.pro server on this Friday, 12:01 from 22:00 (10pm) to 08:00 (08:00am) the next day and the page will not be available.
This also applies to Alexa, etc.

item.title: New Image available for Tinkerboard
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description:
A new ioBroker image for Asus Tinkerboard is available at the download area . The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user. In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo The image is based on armbian.…
Read more New Image available for Tinkerboard ›
item.content:encoded:
A new ioBroker image for Asus Tinkerboard is available at the download area .

The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user.

In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo

The image is based on armbian. With the configuration tool sudo armbian-config it can easily be transferred to USB devices.

item.title: New Image available for Cubieboard 3 (Cubietruck)
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description:
A new ioBroker image for Cubieboard 3 is available at the download area . The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user. In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo The image is based on armbian. With…
Read more New Image available for Cubieboard 3 (Cubietruck) ›
item.content:encoded:
A new ioBroker image for Cubieboard 3 is available at the download area .

The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user.

In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo

The image is based on armbian. With the configuration tool sudo armbian-config it can easily be transferred to NAND or USB devices.

item.title: New Image available for Rock64
item.dc:creator: Homoran
item.description:
A new ioBroker image for Rock64 is available at the download area . The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user. In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo   The image is based on armbian. With…
Read more New Image available for Rock64 ›
item.content:encoded:
A new ioBroker image for Rock64 is available at the download area .

The image comprises the most impotant adapters for homematic user.

In addition there is a very extensive demo project for vis within this image. This can be invoked by  <IP>:8082/vis/index.html?Demo

 

The image is based on armbian. With the configuration tool sudo armbian-config it can easily be transferred to eMMC or USB devices.
